card.name: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
card.text: Yawning Portal — You gain 1 life. (→ Dungeon Level) Dungeon Level — Scry 1. (→ Goblin Bazaar or Twisted Caverns) Goblin Bazaar — Create a Treasure token. (→ Lost Level) Twisted Caverns — Target creature can’t attack until your next turn. (→ Lost Level) Lost Level — Scry 2. (→ Runestone Caverns or Muiral’s Graveyard) Runestone Caverns — Exile the top two cards of your library. You may play them. (→ Deep Mines) Muiral’s Graveyard — Create two 1/1 black Skeleton creature tokens. (→ Deep Mines) Deep Mines — Scry 3. (→ Mad Wizard’s Lair) Mad Wizard’s Lair — Draw three cards and reveal them. You may cast one of them without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Lost Mine of Phandelver
card.text: Cave Entrance — Scry 1. (→ Goblin Lair or Mine Tunnels) Goblin Lair — Create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token. (→ Storeroom or Dark Pool) Mine Tunnels — Create a Treasure token. (→ Dark Pool or Fungi Cavern) Storeroom — Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. (→ Temple of Dumathoin) Dark Pool — Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. (→ Temple of Dumathoin) Fungi Cavern — Target creature gets -4/-0 until your next turn. (→ Temple of Dumathoin) Temple of Dumathoin — Draw a card.

card.name: Tomb of Annihilation
card.text: Trapped Entry — Each player loses 1 life. (→ Veils of Fear or Oubliette) Veils of Fear — Each player loses 2 life unless they discard a card. (→ Sandfall Cell) Sandfall Cell — Each player loses 2 life unless they sacrifice an artifact, a creature, or a land. (→ Cradle of the Death God) Oubliette — Discard a card and sacrifice an artifact, a creature, and a land. (→ Cradle of the Death God) Cradle of the Death God — Create The Atropal, a legendary 4/4 black God Horror creature token with deathtouch.

card.name: Undercity
card.text: You can’t enter this dungeon unless you “venture into Undercity”. Secret Entrance — Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle (Leads to: Forge, Lost Well) Forge — Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. (Leads to: Trap!, Arena) Lost Well — Scry 2. (Leads to: Arena, Stash) Trap! — Target player loses 5 life. (Leads to: Archives) Arena — Goad target creature. (Leads to: Archives, Catacombs) Stash — Create a Treasure token. (Leads to: Catacombs) Archives — Draw a card. (Leads to: Throne of the Dead Three) Catacombs — Create a 4/1 black Skeleton creature token with menace. (Leads to: Throne of the Dead Three) Throne of the Dead Three — Reveal the top ten cards of your library. Put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. It gains hexproof until your next turn. Then shuffle.

card.name: Ajani, Sleeper Agent Emblem
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature or planeswalker spell, target opponent gets two poison counters.

card.text: If a source would deal damage to you or a planeswalker you control, prevent all but 1 of that damage.

card.text: At the beginning of your end step, create three 1/1 white Cat creature tokens with lifelink.

card.name: Chandra, Awakened Inferno Emblem
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, this emblem deals 1 damage to you.

card.text: Whenever you cast a red spell, this emblem deals X damage to any target, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast that spell.

card.name: Chandra, Torch of Defiance Emblem

card.name: Ellywick Tumblestrum Emblem

card.name: Elspeth, Sun's Champion Emblem

card.name: Garruk, Unleashed Emblem
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may search your library for a creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Gideon of the Trials Emblem
card.text: As long as you control a Gideon planeswalker, you can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

card.text: At the beginning of your end step, search your library for a permanent card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Tezzeret, Betrayer of Flesh Emblem
card.text: Whenever an artifact you control becomes tapped, draw a card.

card.name: The Ring
card.text: Your Ring-bearer is legendary and can't be blocked by creatures with greater power. Whenever your Ring-bearer attacks, draw a card, then discard a card. Whenever your Ring-bearer becomes blocked by a creature, that creature's controller sacrifices it at end of combat. Whenever your Ring-bearer deals combat damage to a player, each opponent loses 3 life.
card.reverse-related: Now for Wrath, Now for Ruin!
One Ring to Rule Them All

card.name: Tibalt, Cosmic Impostor Emblem
card.text: You may play cards exiled with Tibalt, Cosmic Impostor, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.

card.name: Tyvar Kell Emblem
card.text: Whenever you cast an Elf spell, it gains haste until end of turn and you draw two cards.

card.name: Venser, the Sojourner Emblem
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, exile target permanent.

card.name: Vivien Reid Emblem
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have vigilance, trample, and indestructible.

card.name: Vraska, Golgari Queen Emblem
card.text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game.

card.name: Will Kenrith Emblem
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Wrenn and Realmbreaker Emblem
card.text: You may play lands and cast permanent spells from your graveyard.

card.name: Wrenn and Seven Emblem
card.text: You have no maximum hand size.

card.name: Wrenn and Six Emblem
card.text: Instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard have retrace.

card.name: Zariel, Archduke of Avernus Emblem
card.text: At the end of the first combat phase on your turn, untap target creature you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.name: Monster // Sorcerer
card.text:
Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.
---
Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, scry 1."

prop.type: Token Enchantment — Aura Role // Token Enchantment — Aura Role

card.name: Royal // Young Hero
card.text:
Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has ward {1}. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)
---
Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature attacks, if its toughness is 3 or less, put a +1/+1 counter on it."

prop.type: Token Enchantment — Aura Role // Token Enchantment — Aura Role

card.name: Wicked // Cursed
card.text:
Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. When this Aura is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life.
---
Enchant creature Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 1/1.

prop.type: Token Enchantment — Aura Role // Token Enchantment — Aura Role

card.name: Monster // Virtuous
card.text:
Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.
---
Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control.

prop.type: Token Enchantment — Aura Role // Token Enchantment — Aura Role

card.name: Royal // Virtuous
card.text:
Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has ward {1}. (Whenever this creature become the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)

prop.type: Token Enchantment — Aura Role // Token Enchantment — Aura Role

card.name: Acorn Stash
card.text: (Place your acorn counters in this area.)

card.name: Poison Counter
card.text: (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

card.name: Ticket Bucket-Bot
card.text: Collect your {TK} (ticket counters) here! Spend them whenever you place a sticker with a {TK} cost.

card.name: Day
card.text: (If it becomes day or night or a daybound permanent enters the battlefield, track day/night for the rest of the game.) As it becomes day, transform all nightbound permanents. If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.

card.name: Night
card.text: As it becomes night, transform all daybound permanents. Permanents enter the battlefield nightbound. If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.

card.name: Foretell
card.text: (After you fortell a card, you can place the exiled card here. You may cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: The Initiative
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures a player controls deal combat damage to you, that player takes the initiative. When you take the initiative and at the beginning of your upkeep, venture into Undercity. (If you're in a dungeon, advance to the next room. If you're not, enter Undercity. You can take the initiative even if you already have it.

card.name: The Monarch
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, draw a card. Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, its controller becomes the monarch.

card.name: On an Adventure
card.text: (After an Adventure resolves, you can place the exiled card here. You may cast the creature from exile.)
card.reverse-related: Faerie Guidemother // Gift of the Fae
Queen of Ice // Rage of Winter
Shepherd of the Flock // Usher to Safety
Virtue of Strength // Virtue of Strength
Young Red Dragon // Bathe in Gold

card.name: Companion
card.text: As each game begins, you can place any one card with companion here if your starting deck meets its condition. You may cast it once from here.

card.name: Copy
card.text: (This token can be used to represent a token that's a copy of a permanent.)

card.name: The Ring Tempts You
card.text: The Ring Tempts You As the Ring tempts you, you get an emblem named The Ring if you don't have one. Then your emblem gains its next ability and you choose a creature you control to become or remain your Ring-bearer. • The Ring can tempt you even if you don't control a creature. • The Ring gains its abilities in order from top to bottom. • Once it gains an ability, it has that ability for the rest of the game. • Each time the Ring tempts you, you must choose a creature if you control one. • Each player can have only one emblem named The Ring and only one Ring-bearer at a time.
